article_title: 4 Drug Regulations Health Care Providers Must Know
article_text:
4 Drug Regulations Health Care Providers Must Know

Law360, New York (March 7, 2016, 12:58 PM ET) -- In recent years, the health care industry has undergone massive regulatory changes in an attempt to improve patient safety and care. As a result, many hospitals and health systems regularly struggle to stay abreast of the changes that affect them — some assigning staff members full-time to the task — in order to minimize the risks of noncompliance. article_metadata.description: In the past year, there have been an abundance of drug-specific regulations on handling, compounding and disposing of pharmaceutical products in the United States, which, due to their potential financial implications, hospital and health system leaders should have squarely in their sights, says Kenneth Maxik at CompleteRX.
